products.description: Custom label option available for hotel soaps.

products.name: Moisturizer
products.description: High-quality 20ml moisturizer, travel-sized for hotels. Custom branding and eco-friendly packaging.

products.name: Conditioner

products.name: Shower Gel
products.description: 20ml shower gel meant for short-stay guests or travel use.

products.name: Shampoo
products.description: Travel-size hotel shampoo, 20ml per bottle.

notes: All items (moisturizer, conditioner, shower gel, shampoo) available with custom hotel logo.
Orderable in assorted or single-type cartons.

products.name: Disposable Slippers (Regular)
features: Non-slip sole for safety on various surfaces
Unisex – suitable for men and women
products.description: Comfortable, hygienic slippers for hotels, spas, salons, or guest use.

products.name: Disposable Slippers (Green Logo)
products.description: Branded with a green logo, these are also suitable for hotels and guest rooms.

products.name: Disposable Slippers (With Open Toe)
products.description: Open toe slippers for enhanced comfort, supplied in bulk.

products.name: Toothpaste
products.description: Available in leading Indian brands. Small tubes ideal for one-time hotel guest use.

products.name: Dental Kit
products.description: Complete dental kit (toothpaste+toothbrush) in printed box for hotels. MOQ 500 sets.

products.name: Wooden Toothbrush
products.description: Eco-friendly bamboo/wooden toothbrush for sustainable hotel amenities.

products.name: Plastic Toothbrush
products.description: Standard white hotel-use toothbrushes.

variants.description: Disposable razors suitable for hotel amenities or travel kits.
Compact kit in a pouch, ideal for guest amenities.
Complete shaving kit with razor and gel in a printed box. Wholesale packaging for hotels, also customizable.
Sachet of shaving gel - compact and convenient for single use.
Kit includes razor and shaving gel packed in a pouch.
Shaving kit (razor + gel) in custom-printed box. Bulk supply.
Premium wax shoe shiner for hotels. Convenient and effective for guests’ footwear. Provides a polished, long-lasting shine with minimal effort. Suitable for travel, hotel rooms, and guest kits.
Durable hotel-grade combs in classic 8-inch design for guest use.
Comb individually packed in a hygienic pouch, ideal for hotels and guest kits.

products.name: Hotel Guest Kit
products.description: A curated collection of essential toiletries and amenities designed to provide a luxurious hotel stay experience. Each kit includes: premium shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion, dental care set, and a comb, all beautifully packed for convenience. Crafted with gentle, skin-friendly ingredients for a refreshing and comfortable guest experience. Suitable for hotels seeking to enhance their amenity offerings.
products.customization: Packaging and product selection customizable as per hotel requirements.

products.name: Naphthalene Balls (Colored)
products.description: Multi-colored naphthalene balls used for deodorizing and insect repellent purposes in closets, bathrooms, and storage spaces. Available in attractive pastel colors.
packaging_options: Bulk pack (pouch with Swiss Comforts logo)
features: Protects clothes and storage spaces from insects
Ideal for hotels, homes, wardrobes, and restrooms

products.name: Naphthalene Balls (White)
products.description: Classic white naphthalene balls, ideal for repelling insects and maintaining a fresh scent in various storage and sanitary areas.

products.name: Urinal Screen Deodorizer Mat
products.description: Durable, non-slip urinal screen mat designed to fit in urinals, trap debris, prevent clogs, and release a fresh fragrance to maintain restroom cleanliness and hygiene. Especially suited for high-traffic public restrooms.
features: Fresh and clean scent (lemon, orange, rose, ocean)

products.name: Disposable Glass Cover
products.description: Single-use, paper-based glass covers designed to provide a hygienic drinking glass experience for hotel guests. Helps assure cleanliness and safety in hospitality settings.
features: Printed 'Sanitized & Cleaned' message or custom hotel branding

products.name: Non Woven Disposable Laundry Bag
products.description: Single-use laundry bags made from durable non-woven material, designed for hotels and hospitality industry. Ideal for guest laundry collection.
products.customization: Branding/logo printing available for large hotel chains (e.g., 'Hyatt Place', 'The Fern', 'Marigold').

products.name: Toilet Seat WC Band
products.description: Ensures hygiene and cleanliness for hotels, hospitals, and premium establishments. Used as a seal of sanitation, assures guests that the toilet seat has been freshly cleaned and disinfected.
features: Acts as a seal of sanitation for toilets
Easily fits around standard toilet seats

products.name: Paper Glass Coaster
products.description: Lightweight, eco-friendly beverage coaster made from high-quality paper material. Designed to protect surfaces from spills, condensation, or heat damage in hotels, cafes, and events.
features: Available with branding, designs, and messages

products.name: Shower Cap
products.description: Disposable shower cap available in green, blue and white color options. Waterproof, elastic, individually packed.

products.name: Sewing Kit
products.description: Practical and compact sewing kit ideal for hotel guests. Contains all basic sewing essentials for minor repairs.
